title: Crazy Old Janitor

fields.name: Drops:
fields.value: 完, 炒, 1-4 尬, or 2-3 往

desc:
*Get out of my closet!*

They reduce all of your buff durations with every attack. Such items are uncommon this early in the game, but if you do find any, it might be best to save them until a bit later into the game, so there's no risk of wasting any part of the effect.
